name: Scary Teacher Chat Fun- Master
description:
Teacher Chat Fun Master Story is a best Fun Chat Game.
Each level is a new Chat Story. In each chat Story, you can choose what message to send.

Can you get through every texting scene?
- Interesting Chat stories
- Choose the right path
- Really a Fun game
- User-friendly interface
you gonna love this game.

Disclaimer: No real call feature exist in this game it have prank call feature for fun.
